siteMetadata.title: Aldrich Huang
siteMetadata.description: I'm the CEO & Co-founder of UXTesting.io, Global Mentor of UXPA and Board Member of UXQCC. With several years of working experience in the field of legal, business development, and user experience strategy, I firmly believes that the better user experience will bring joy to your users and the diversity will bring more value for your organizations.
siteMetadata.author: Aldrich Huang
